title: Pizza Dough
instructions: Add up to 3/4 C. water, only adding more until the dough comes together in a shaggy ball.
If using a stand mixer, switch to the dough hook and knead at low-medium speed for seven minutes—or until the dough passes the windowpane test.
Shape the dough into a ball and place in a lightly oiled bowl. Cover, and let sit at room temperature for half an hour.
Place in refridgerator overnight, making sure the dough has room to expand (I use a gallon freezer bag).
When ready to bake, shape into a ball on a floured surface, dust with flour, cover loosely, and allow it to come to room temperature before shaping.
